page.title: 16HOME LIFE
page.content:
A Day In The Life Of Joy Payne
On Saturday mornings I get up get dressed and then go down for my breakfast.I have a drink of coffee and sometimes some toast.When I have had my breakfast I go upstairs and have a wash then I come down again and I go round for Caroline about 9.30am to 10.00am. When she has got ready we go up to my house and sometimes go up to Ashbourne. When we come back we play outside for a bit and watch television then I have my dinner and we sometimes bake for my mum. When we have done a few cakes my Aunty Lynn and Uncle Roger come round for a drink.When they go we play out for a bit then it is time for my tea. When I finished my tea we stop in and watch television.
